data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Varaždinska to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Varaždinska, Croatia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Varaždinska, Croatia to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 16 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Varaždinska, Croatia.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Varaždinska, Croatia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 699 believers in the state of Varaždinska with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Varaždinska, Croatia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 699 believers in Varaždinska, Croatia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 699 believers in Varaždinska, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.
